body:
Comment 18 by **chris@altonymous.com**: 
Okay but there's no way for me to stop it from traversing those directories.  The syntax
you suggested above does not work.  So if I have no way to exclude directories then what
do I do when files are created outside my control; such as a file created by git itself
like in my example?   It sounds like my only alternative is to clone it somewhere other
than my GOPATH then move all the project files, excluding the .git directory, to GOPATH
before building.  That seems her unintuative?
